About Us

Domino's Pizza on Yigal Alon St in Tel Aviv offers pizza delivery and takeaway services as part of the global Domino's Pizza chain. Conveniently located, we provide delicious pizzas right to your doorstep.

Our Services

We offer quick and reliable pizza delivery and takeaway services. Order online or via phone for the best pizza experience in Tel Aviv.

Customer Reviews

"Avoid at all costs, delivery tracking was slowly progressing and delaying for 2 hours until suddenly it said 'arrived', but no pizza was ever delivered. Customer support is unavailable." - Igor Okun

"Terrible service, did not deliver the pizza, and the marked the delivery as done. No one to talk with." - Liad Harduf

"AVOID AT ALL COSTS DELIVERY TAKES FOREVER, THE PIZZA ARRIVES COLD, NOBODY TO TALK TO OR SPEAK TO." - youvebeenzapped
